abstract: The once-prominent hedge fund, Pequot Capital Management, and its chief executive agreed to settle a Securities and Exchange Commission complaint accusing them of insider trading involving Microsoft shares.
snippet: The once-prominent hedge fund, Pequot Capital Management, and its chief executive agreed to settle a Securities and Exchange Commission complaint accusing them of insider trading involving Microsoft shares.
lead_paragraph: A once-prominent hedge fund, Pequot Capital Management, and its chief executive, Arthur J. Samberg, agreed on Thursday to settle a Securities and Exchange Commission complaint accusing them of insider trading involving Microsoft shares, The New York Times reported.

headline.main: Pequot and Its Chief Settle Insider Complaint
